actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the exclusion from gross income of certain amounts attributable to inflation.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax deduction for the inflation adjustment amount of all the earned interest and all the increase in the personal service income of a taxpayer which does not exceed the percentage change in the Consumer Price Index for the taxable year. Includes among deductible amounts interest on savings accounts, corporate indebtedness, and government bonds.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the exclusion from gross income of certain amounts attributable to inflation.
